speaker: cat
dialog: Huh, this seems important! You should check it out!

speaker: froggie
dialog: Alrighty, let's see what's here... (Press A to interact with things like this sign!)

speaker: sign
dialog: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA --- (Ahem) Congrats, you learned how to interact with stuff.

speaker: snek
dialog: GIVE FUIT!!! No entry until FUIT has been RECEIVED!!!

speaker: cat
dialog: Of course they wouldn't let us enter that easily. Here comes the side quest...

speaker: cat
dialog: I guess we'll just have to find their FUIT and give it to them to enter that door...

speaker: froggie
dialog: Oh hey, look! There's an appl-- I mean FUIT -- buried underneath the dirt mound!

speaker: froggie
dialog: I wonder how we'll reach it, though...

speaker: mole
dialog: Oh!! I can DIG up the app -- FUIT -- for you! (Press [ D ] to dig!)
